pwiz::analysis::SpectrumListWrapper

pwiz::analysis::SpectrumListWrapper Class Reference

#include <SpectrumListWrapper.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for pwiz::analysis::SpectrumListWrapper:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Inheritable pass-through implementation for wrapping a SpectrumList.

Definition at line 37 of file SpectrumListWrapper.hpp.
